mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SAFEUSER_INFO ( USER_ID USER_NAME PASSWORD EMAIL ADDR1 ADDR2 STORENAME BNUMBER PNUMBER REG_ID REG_DT CHG_ID CHG_DT ) VALUES( #{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{password}, #{email}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{storename}, #{bnumber}, #{pnumber}, #{user_id}, SYSDATE, #{user_id}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT DECODE(COUNT(1),0,'N','Y') AS EXISTS_YN FROM SAFEUSER_INFO WHERE EMAIL=#{email}
